thread.title: King family marks 50th anniversary of civil rights leader's assassination

title: King family marks 50th anniversary of civil rights leader's assassination
text:
King family marks 50th anniversary of civil rights leader's assassination 12:24pm IST - 02:20 
The family of Martin Luther King Jr. gather in Atlanta, Georgia to ring a bell for each year of the civil rights leader's life and to lay a wreath on the 50th anniversary of his assassination. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
The family of Martin Luther King Jr. gather in Atlanta, Georgia to ring a bell for each year of the civil rights leader's life and to lay a wreath on the 50th anniversary of his assassination. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2JliNlp
